article.Heading: Four months post GST roll out, only 56% taxpayers filed returns: Sources
article.Summary: CNBC-TV18 learn from sources that goods and services tax (GST) compliance continues to be a concern. Four months post GST roll out, only 56 percent of taxpayers have filed returns.
article.Body:
CNBC-TV18 learn from sources that goods and services tax (GST) compliance continues to be a concern. Four months post GST roll out, only 56 percent of taxpayers have filed returns.

Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18â€™s Timsy Jaipuria for more details.
